data.text: @AdamyaVikrant Sir, please allow us sometime to get this checked with the airport team. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@shahidjuhi Sir, sorry to note your disappointment. Please DM us your PNR & contact number so we can connect with you at the earliest. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@BikashS21558679 Mr Swain, we do not have direct flight on this route. ~Linda
@PreeteshDev Yes you can, up to 100 ml. ~Linda
@shiva_ip2006 We believe our team has contacted and addressed your concern. We've taken note of your feedback. Hope to serve you well in future. ~Shreya
@vishal_rocks1 Sir, we regret to see this. Please DM the PNR so we may check. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@shubha79 Mr Choudhury, thanks for suggesting! We'll surely pass it on to our route planning team. ~Linda

@IamMukeshTyagi Mr Tyagi, we regret the bittersweet experience. Hope you're feeling better now. Further, we shall have your feedback shared with the concerned team immediately for necessary review. We look forward to serving you soon on board. ~Linda

urls.title: Travel Guidelines: International Arrivals & Departures - IndiGo
urls.description: Mandatory travel guidelines for passengers flying from India to international destinations and back to India. Detailed advisory & requirements at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @sbijalm Ma'am, please visit https://t.co/ICsDDkw2bN and enter your departure and arrival sectors to know about the international travel guidelines in detail. You may reach out to the concerned embassy/authorities for more clarity in this regard. ~Shreya
@shriramkv Mr Vasudevan, we take great delight in serving our customers relentlessly. Your kind words of appreciation will be passed on to Amrita which will definitely make her day. #GoIndiGo ~Linda

@rgtmraghav Sir, we understand your concern. Please know that, our fares  are dynamic in nature, and may increase or decrease at any given time. You may avail the auto seat assignment during web check-in to avoid the seat charges. We look forward for your understanding of the same. ~Diyashi
@ScoopsNani We look forward to your understanding. ~Diyashi (2/2)

@ScoopsNani Hi, we’d like to clarify that power banks and battery operated articles strictly be carried in the hand baggage only, since the check-in bag was stuck at level-4, airport security bas removed the said article in order to clear the bag.(1/2)
@surajrathore Sir, we regret the experience. Please DM the PNR along with the contact number so we may connect. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@akhil276 We regret the delayed response. Could you please share you PNR via DM so we may check and assist you. ~Diyashi

@Tauquee52449915 Mr Ahmad, complete name changes are not permitted once the booking is confirmed. However, minor spelling errors can be rectified. Please DM us your PNR along with a Govt. ID proof for us to check & advise. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@ReshmiVarma Ma'am, we regret the experience. Please DM the PNR so we may check. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@cruddybug_ Hi, sorry to note your disappointment. Please DM us your experience in detail along with the PNR for us to take a closer look. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@luckysinghal987 Mr Singhal, that will work for an infant. ~Linda
@thoongumoonji1 Hi, we're here to assist you. Please DM us your PNR along with the contact number so we can get in touch with you right away. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@niadongare12 Ma'am we are getting this checked. Allow us some time to get back to you. ~Diyashi
@balramgkp Hi, needful done & an updated itinerary has been sent to the registered email ID. ~Linda

@sachinsraghavan Mr Raghavan, we can understand your anxiety her. Please drop the PNR on our DM so we may have a closer look into it on priority and update you. ~Sheetal
  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@Prkhr19 Hi, please be informed that the concerned team will update you on your concern shortly. Thank you for your kind patience. ~Sheetal

@info_rakesha We understand your disappointment. Please be informed that our check in counter closes 60 mins and the boarding gate closes 25 mins prior to the departure. Please connect with our team to assist you with booking the next available flight. ~Diyashi
@codingdash We are disappointed to hear this. Could you please your PNR via so we may share the feed with the concerned team. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@juhi9027 Ma'am you may carry your monitor in your checked in luggage. Please ensure the same is properly packed and sealed. ~Diyashi

urls.title: Manage Booking: Edit, cancel & reschedule flight - IndiGo
urls.description: Manage your IndiGo flight booking. Select a seat, edit, change, cancel & reschedule your flight. Get your travel itinerary, download ticket or print boarding pass.

data.text: @Artan9497 Sir, you may change/cancel your flight here: https://t.co/xgObbSkVrJ to avoid a no-show. Please feel free to reach out to us via DM for any assistance. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@pratapgorde Mr Gorde, we regret the inconvenience caused. Please know that free seats are limited and gets quickly occupied. You may opt for the auto seat assignment to avail the seats without any charges. ~Diyashi
@Anuja1012 Ma'am, we are here to assist you. Please share your contact details with us via DM so we may connect with you. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Suryavamzi We will surely try our best to find your earbuds. Please share the PNR with us via DM so we may forward the required details to the concerned team. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@abhijeetgraphic Sir, we would like to have a closer look into it. Please share the PNR with us via DM, we'll check and assist. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@drhemantortho Thank you for the shout-out, Sir. We are passing on your word of thanks to the concerned person. We wish to see you flying with us, again! #goIndiGo ~Sheetal

@rathinikesh Uh-oh :( This is upsetting, Mr Rathi. While we would really like you to adore nature's beauty, please know that the seats are assigned as per the availability. Drop your PNR via DM so we may check if anything can be done for you.😊 ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@dogmatic_theist Hello, we regret the inconvenience. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we may check and assist you. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@rohittmahajann We regret to see this Mr Mahajan.  Customer's safety is our first priority. We are getting the matter checked on priority and shall do the needful ~Diyashi
Our global-first, innovative 'Three-Point Disembarkation System'. This will enable the customer to exit the aircraft faster than ever before. #goIndiGo https://t.co/iJ7ZR9HtjV
@sagarjaipareek Mr Pareek, we regret the hassle could you please share your PNR via DM so we may get it checked and assist you. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@molosur Hello, we regret the hassle, could you please share your PNR via DM so we get it checked and assist you. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@lazyankitsingh We regret to hear this sir. We try to make the journey as comfortable as possible for everyone. Could you please share the PNR via DM so we may get it checked. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Rahul4cat Thank you for the appreciation sir. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we may pass on the kudos to the team.  ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@shailu212 Sir, could you please share your PNR via DM so we may check and assist you. ~Diyashi
@raghavanrs We regret to hear this sir. We understand it can very disappointing. We are getting the matter checked. Allow us some time to get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi

@gauravsingla_ Mr Singla, the inconvenience is regretted. Please clear cache & cookies from your web browser history or try an alternate web browser. Let us know via DM if you're still unable to do the needful. ~Sheetal
  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@Pratikmank Mr Mankar, we believe our team has addressed your concern over the mail, please revert to the same for further assistance. ~Sheetal

@AvaSmit61404739 Hi, please know that if the flight is canceled from our end, passengers can choose an alternate flight option or can opt for a full refund via plan B sent on the registered number. Please share the error with us via DM so we may check & assist. ~Sheetal
  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@sridharnunavat Sir, we regret to hear this. Could you please share the concern in details along with the PNR via DM so we may check with the concerned team. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@drgauravluthra Sir, we have addressed this on your DM, please check! ~Sheetal

@am_tony_m We regret the inconvenience caused. Could you please share you PNR via DM, so may share your feedback  with the concerned team. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@am_tony_m This doesn't seem right, Mr Mathew. We would like to have a check on this on priority, please DM us the PNR and allow us some time. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@ChandanVerma21 Sir, you may avail free seats by choosing the auto seat assignment.  Could you please share you PNR via DM so we may get the matter checked. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@ChandanVerma21 Mr Verma, let us check this for you. Please DM us your PNR, we'll update you shortly on this. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@abhishekshori11 Mr Shori, we regret the behavior as our staff is expected to be courteous to all our customers. Please DM us your PNR so we may share the feedback with the concerned team. ~Sheetal
  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@ChandanaSBabu1 Ma'am, we never want our customers to have this kind of experience. Please drop your PNR on our DM so we may have a closer look into it. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

urls.title: Baggage Allowance, IndiGo Baggage Allowance | IndiGo
urls.description: Get the detailed information on Indigo baggage allowance for your all domestic flights as well as international flights. Know the number and weight of baggage prices you are allowed to carry during your journey.

data.text: @AshishBhatt91 Sir, we have 15 kg checked in baggage allowance for domestic and 30 kgs checked in baggage allowance for international journey. You may check https://t.co/MHkMsFJweg for detailed information. Hoping to see you on board soon. ~Diyashi
@xashtug We regret to hear this. We have noted your feedback and shall share with the concerned team. Hoping to serve you better on your next flight. ~Diyashi

data.text: @iamthirlok Hello, we are glad you liked it. Hoping to see you on board soon, ordering upma. ~Diyashi
@Shiv35277040 Sir, please share your contact details via DM so we may connect with you in this regard. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@AmitMan22093039 Mr Manhas, we understand your agony here, please allow us some time while we get this checked with our team and we'll resolve this at the earliest. ~Sheetal
@vkmallips Sir, as checked, due to technical issues, there was a delay. Hope you have a pleasant flight. ~Diyashi
@vkmallips Hello sir, allow us some time, we are getting the concern checked. ~Diyashi
@Deepak7qwerty We are regret the inconvenience.  We have noted your feedback in this regard and shall pass on the same to our concerned team. ~Diyashi
@nadhiyamali @indigo Ma’am, we’re so glad that this was another #6e experience. We look forward to seeing you onboard again, Soon. ~Kritika
@ganx75 Sir, certain items are available only when they are pre-booked. However, we have noted your feedback for internal review on this. We request your understanding in this regard. ~Prahlad
@KuvamBehl Sir, we regret to hear this. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we may look in to the matter on priority. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Manikandan2k4 Sir, please DM us your PNR so we may check and assist you. ~Prahlad  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@abdismf Hi, we'd like to look into this and request you to DM us your PNR for the same. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@LubdhHathi Hi, we regret the experience and request you to DM us your PNR and Contact Number so we may get in touch with you in regards to your raised concern. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@145_richa You're most welcome and we wish you a great day. 💙 ~Navi

data.text: @145_richa Hi, we request you to share the PNR/ Flight details and name of the customer via DM so we may check on the same and assist. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@Muhamma70971199 Mr Kamran, you can carry 2 pieces of Check-In Luggage, not exceeding 30 kgs in total per passenger to/ from Jeddah. ~Navi
@riz1habib Mr Habib, we have replied to your DM and request you to kindly check on the same. Thanks. ~Navi
@leela_kalyani Ms Kalyani, we have replied to your DM and request you to kindly check on the same. Thanks. ~Navi
@mohitb113 Mr Bhatia, we'll contact you in next 24 to 48 hrs for the same and request your patience. Thanks. ~Navi
@subhashhbhosale Mr Bhosale, we regret to note this and will contact you in next 24 hrs in regards to your experience with us. ~Navi

@mohitb113 Mr Bhatia, feedback against your raised concern is shared with the respective team to avoid re-occurrence and we look forward to serving you in a better way, next time you travel with us. ~Navi

@Ripple8130 Hi, children above the age of 3 days and under the age of 2 years, as on the date of travel, can travel as Infants. Rest, mother's hospital discharge summary is also acceptable as a valid ID proof for the infant. We hope this helps. ~Navi
@akilpatelrajkot Mr Patel, we understand your concern and have replied to you via DM. Kindly check on the same. Thanks. ~Navi
@AdityaDe11 Mr Dey, we regret to see this and request you to DM us your Contact Number so we may get in touch with you to assist. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@RajeshM10249861 We can understand your pain, Mr Mehta. Did you report the damage to the arrival staff at the airport? Meanwhile please help us with the PNR via DM. ~Sheetal  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@DharmeshGauswam Thanks. As checked, your baggage is out for delivery and will be delivered to you in next 24 hrs. We request you to confirm on the same, once received and look forward to serving you in a better way, next time you travel with us. ~Navi

@CommonManSomu Hi, we regret the trouble. This is not the experience we wish for our customers to have. We request you to allow us some time. We are getting this checked with our concerned team and will get back to you with an update.~ Nandita

data.text: @hopeasha Yes, Sir. Please visit https://t.co/STkfj4FtT8 for details. You'd have to carry an original student photo id (a hard copy, instead of any photocopy/soft copy) which must be valid on your date of travel. ~Shreya
@Singhkhushwant Sir, we're glad to celebrate your anniversary in 6E style. Happy Anniversary, Mr Singh😍. We'll surely praise our crew for such lovely efforts. #goindiGo~Shreya

@subhashhbhosale opt for auto-seat assignment & complete the web check-in wherein the boarding pass will be sent to the registered email ID within 12-3 hrs prior to the departure. Also, you may always reach out to us prior to the departure incase you face any challenges. ~Linda (2/2)

data.text: @subhashhbhosale Mr Bhosale, we never want families travelling together sitting separate which is why we recommend customers to pre-book their preferred seats online. If you do not have a preferred seat, you can choose any of the free seats online, subject to availability or (1/2)
@AmitCTweets We're happy to assist you. ~Shreya

@rajeshghusinga Mr Ghusinga, our free seats are limited which get occupied quickly. You can always opt for auto-seat assignment & complete the web check-in wherein the boarding pass will be sent to the registered email ID within 12-3 hrs prior to the departure. ~Linda

users.name: thoongumoonji - rage, rage against the dying light
